answers.answer: Hi,The diagnosis of impotence follows a particular criteria. Does the erectile problem happen at least 25% of the time? Or was this only an isolated episode?How is your condition now? Do you get frequent night time erections?Are there any problems with erection and ejaculation?How is your condition now?This may not be something urgent at this point. Continue to observe your sexual responses. There are several factors involved with erectile problem and this include a localized penile problem, a systemic problem involving the nervous system and the vascular system.Do you have any underlying conditions like diabetes or hypertension?Are you taking any medications?
